name: Flee Runner
description:
Are you a fan of 2d sonic games? or you just like fast-paced platformers? Then you came to the right place. Flee runner is a 2d platfromer in which you play as a alien traped in basement of evil corporation, will you manage to escape?

This game was created for week 140 of weekly game jam

Theme for it was "ShapeShift", in my game character can shift into a flatter version of himself that is also deadly towards enemies and grants him immunity to damage.

Credits
  • Game Design - NoelOskar
  • Scripts - NoelOskar
  • Art - NoelOskar
  • Sound - NoelOskar
  • Music - Evan King
